text: The booth was very interactive. It taught our kids science in a very fun manner. The toy car powered by air instead of battery was very interesting. Thank you for the opportunity for our kids to learn science,  and made it fun.
A fun & interactive experience at One Punggol Hawker Centre. The ladies are friendly and my boy enjoyed the experiment very much.

Perfect Science Classes that suits those who wants to get hand-on, and not just do worksheets. The experiments that the Centre plan are very educational and fun. You can gain extra knowledge that are extremely useful here!
At Punggol One and bumped into their exhibit/booth. Interesting and interactive showcase for kids to understand science.
Super cool experiments for all kids of any ages to try! A good gateway to get them into science :)
